drupalNodeEvent.title: Political Thinkers in the Xi Jinping Era

field_speakers.processed: David Ownby (Université de Montréal); Glenn Tiffert (Hoover Institution)

field_description.processed: China’s establishment intellectuals are not widely known beyond its borders. These professors, journalists, writers, and artists try to shape public debate and official policy and more or less play by the Chinese Communist Party’s rules without acting as spokespeople for it. Ownby will describe the evolution of their “thought world,” which has adapted to Xi Jinping’s tighter strictures, and introduce a number of its key thinkers and themes.
